import java.io.*;
import java.util.*;
class naksh
{
 static long combi(long N,long R)
{
    long cal=1;
    R=R>N-R?N-R:R;
    for(long j=1;j<=R;j++,N--)
    {
        if(N%j==0)
        {
            cal*=N/j;
        }
		else
        if(cal%j==0)
        {
            cal=cal/j*N;
        }else
        {
            cal=(cal*N)/j;
        }
    }
    return cal;
}
   public static void main(String[] args)
   {
       Scanner s = new Scanner(System.in);
      	int t = s.nextInt();
       for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
       {
       long n = s.nextLong();
       long k=s.nextLong();
	   long ans = combi(n,k);
	   System.out.println(ans);
       }
   }
 
}
